title: Mozilla Firefox 0.9 Is Here!
body: <a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/blog.net/articles/useful_software.aspx#realbrowser" title="Firefox">Firefox</a>! Grab your torrent of choice <a href="http://www.pryan.org/mozilla/bt-tracker/">from this server</a>.  Make sure you have the latest-greatest <a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/blog.net/articles/useful_software.aspx#bittornado" title="BitTornado">BitTornado</a> first, or even plain jane <a href="http://bitconjurer.org/BitTorrent/download.html">BitTorrent</a>.  <a href="http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?t=84403&amp;postdays=0&amp;postorder=asc&amp;postsperpage=15&amp;start=0">Look at all those geeks ;-)</a>, why don't they do something productive, like <a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/blog.net/archive/2004/04/15/Mozilla_FireFox_real_browser_Bugs.aspx">fix bugs</a>.

bodyNavItems.text: So my car was broken into last night
